Headline: #3 King Drive Temporary Reroute near King Drive/71st
ShortDescription: 3 King Dr rrtd NB via King Dr, 71st, St. Lawrence, S Chcgo, Keefe, 69th & King Dr: SB via King Dr, 69th, So Chgo, 71st & King Dr due to blockage nr King Dr/71st

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#3 King Drive buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions due to street blockage near King Drive/71st.

  • Northbound buses will operate via King Drive, 71st, St. Lawrence, South Chicago, Keefe, 69th & King Drive.
  • Southbound buses will operate via King Drive, 69th, South Chicago, 71st & King Drive.

Allow extra travel time.
